body: Am i the first to do it?

title: Anvil Kill!

replies.body: It took 2 out of my five anvils! To bad it didn't give me the kill credit tho...

replies.body: It was done almost on every match on MC Zone Times

replies.body: Me rot and kiwi made a glass arena and played squish each other with the anvil... :D We made 32 anvils so you can imagine how much iron.... :)
replies.body_tagged: Me rot and kiwi made a glass arena and played squish each other with the anvil... :D We made 32 anvils so you can imagine how much iron.... :)

replies.body:
ahahaha, thats creative and hilarious, just yesterday i was nearly hit by an anvil but never saw who dropped it... lol, i may have a suspect now. XD

by the way i was on Justice II when this happened :)
